value:
This place sure is beautiful. So
beautiful it's unsettling... Truth told,
just being here makes me anxious.

When Ram Village was attacked, it
wasn't like I could just do nothing.

You on patrol? You look stressed out.
If you ever want to unwind, just give
me a holler.

Where do people go to have fun
around here? I know how to have
a good time, so anywhere's fine.$k$pYou've gotta show me around!

This place is messing me up. It
makes the world I've known up till
now feel so...insignificant...

If you believe in me, well... I
better not slack off.

I'm just an average guy from a village
in the middle of nowhere. I'll help out,
if you want me to. Name's Gray.

Hey, $Nu...
I have to ask you this. Why did you
summon me here?$k$pTake a look around. Princes and
princesses...even from other worlds.
Everywhere!$k$pI have to laugh. You know I'm just
some schlub from a tiny village in the
middle of nowhere, right?$k$pYou're saying you need my help? You
called me here...because I'm a Hero,
too?$k$pJoke's on you! I knew that's what you
were going to say. But I'm surprised
that you kept a straight face...$k$pIf you really do think of me as a Hero,
well... I feel like I'm stronger than
anyone—even some king.
Man... This whole situation just does not feel real.
We're from the middle of nowhere. I'm talking middle of NOWHERE.
Work hard, reap the rewards. You know I'm right.
I'm handsome, I know. But there's no need to stare.
There's never a dull moment with you around.
